title: PhD Supervisor
description: The recipient is an academic supervisor to a PhD student. They hold a position of authority and influence over the student's academic and financial well-being, and likely manage multiple students and departmental responsibilities. They are expected to be understanding of personal challenges but also need to consider institutional policies and resource limitations.
userTask: I am a phd student and while my stipend will expire in 1 month, I want to write an email to my supervisor to ask for a 3-month extension because my father got ill and I temprarly need more funding to support my family
